titleStmt.title: By the King an abstract of the seuerall heads and branches of His Maiesties commission of grace, for the securing, setling, and confirming to his subiects their defectiue titles, estates and possessions, by which His Maiesties commissioners haue power to compound.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
